main_page.label: Virginia Department of Health COVIDWISE Main Page

privacy_policy.label: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.desc: This “Privacy Policy” explains how the Virginia Department of Health (“VDH”) collects, uses, discloses and otherwise processes end users’ data in connection with the COVIDWISE mobile application (“COVIDWISE App”). This Privacy Policy also describes the choices available to individuals with respect to data when using the COVIDWISE App.

optin.label: Using the COVIDWISE App is completely voluntary, and you may choose to install and uninstall the COVIDWISE App at any time

optout.label: OPTING OUT OF PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
optout.url: You can deactivate push notifications and alerts at any time by deleting the COVIDWISE App, changing your device settings, or changing the push notification settings within the COVIDWISE App.
